education.courses: Courses: Artificial Intelligence, Intelligent systems, Pattern Recognition and Neural networks

education.institution: Savitribai Phule Pune University 08/2019 - 07/2023 B. Tech
education.courses: Courses: Data Structures (used C++), OOP (used Java), Microprocessors, Database Management (used SQL), Cellular Networks

experience.title: Associate Software Developer Intern
description: Developed an AI-based project utilizing machine learning techniques, data pipelines and OpenAI API effectively to streamline specific IT processes, customer support tasks.
Worked on data warehousing and data analysis for optimum data retrieval and reporting. Conducted data processing and transformation using SQL and Excel to streamline the machine learning workflow.

Used decision tree algorithms, GitHub and Bitbucket for version control. Explored the potential of RAG & fine-tuning pipelines for automation of time-consuming client cases and reduced time taken to complete the case by around 60%.

Parallelly managed the development of an HR competency dashboard for user friendly competency management of employees, where I did extensive analysis of company’s database schema on Power BI to understand different team relationships and hierarchy and accurately represent them on the HR competency dashboard.

experience.title: Business Developer Intern
description: Conducted competitive analysis and managed the social media marketing strategy to attract affiliates.
Worked on UI/UX design, content creation and digital marketing for the startup.
Engaged with the founder to analyze company’s SWOT and business strategy in Indian markets.

projects.title: Aura sense - Identity and Mood Recognition system
description: Developed a comprehensive system for gender and mood recognition using CNN models.

For gender classification, implemented transfer learning with the MobileNetV2 architecture and applied data augmentation and upscaling techniques, achieving a test accuracy of 98.38%. As this was a team project it enhanced my project management skills.
For mood recognition, designed and trained a CNN model to effectively evaluate a range of emotions from facial images.

projects.title: Sentiment analysis on Mental Health dataset
description: Combined and cleaned a dataset of 90000 statements mapped to 11 different emotions.
Comparing accuracy and training efficiencies of traditional ML models like Linear SVC, RandomForestClassifier and LSTM.
Enhancing the Gemini powered Mental Health Chatbot to use sentiment analysis and emotion classified results in its responses.

projects.title: SchedulrAI – Computer vision and GPU optimized Image to schedule system
description: Built a tool to extract events from images of tables using OCR (Tesseract) and AI, mapping them into structured Google Calendar schedules. Useful for images with timetable, movie tickets, conference schedules, etc.
Emphasized GPU-based acceleration for real-time processing and performance tuning.

projects.title: DockAssist: AI-Powered Dockerfile Generator
description: DockAssist is an AI-powered tool designed to make Docker and containerization more accessible for developers—especially beginners
By simply uploading your project details, DockAssist generates a ready-to-use Dockerfile, ensuring your application is containerized with best practices.

projects.title: Voice-Controlled AI Virtual Assistant
description: Developed a virtual personal assistant integrated with ChatGPT API, targeted for students, professionals and blind users.
Used Python, PyQT, ChatGPT API, Text to speech library - Pyttsx3, Whisper. Explored Amazon Transcribe and SpeechBrain.

AI & Machine Learning: Open source Huggingface and Streamlit cloud.
Automation & Testing: Linux for data management and virtualization.
